High Prefect Took:
Tejakar Oroka! Oh, young adventurer, may the zeal of the sacred flame be with you on your journey.
I am Took of the Dudamara clan. I have come here as High Prefect to represent the Orc clan.
This is the starting point for many adventurers. They must prove themselves through battle, obtaining qualifications and advancing to greater challenges. May the confidence you earn through your sweat and blood serve you well later in life.
Hear information about the class transfer.
Use the Certificate of Courage.
